indent-string

Indent each line in a string

Install

$ npm install --save indent-string

Usage

```js var indentString = require(‘indent-string’);

indentString(‘Unicorns\nRainbows’, ‘♥’, 4); //=> ♥♥♥♥Unicorns //=> ♥♥♥♥Rainbows ```

API

indentString(string, indent, count)

string

Required
Type: string

The string you want to indent.

indent

Required
Type: string

The string to use for the indent.

count

Type: number
Default: 1

How many times you want indent repeated.

Related

  • indent-string-cli - CLI for this module
  • strip-indent - Strip leading whitespace from every line in a string
